summary: My tire pressure monitoring system showed a low tire.  I looked and found no nails or other items in the tire.  I changed to my spare and took the tire to the tire dealer.  He found a crack in the rim near the valve stem - started at the hole. This happened in March of this year.   On a recent trip, the same thing happened on another rim.  The crack this time was also near the valve stem hole.  The crack this time went the direction of the circumference of the rim for about 1".  The Les Schwab dealer said he has seen this several times on other vehicles. Neither wheel/rim would hold air pressure.   If the crack had been worse, I could have had a wheel/rim failure and possibly crash.  I also was on remote roads in Idaho and could have been stranded if the spare wheel would have cracked.

manufacturer: Cabot Coach Builders Inc-DBA Royale Limo

summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2017 MERCEDES-BENZ SPRINTER. THE CONTACT STATED WHILE DRIVING 35 MPH, THE STEERING WHEEL BECAME DIFFICULT TO TURN. THE VEHICLE STALLED WITHOUT WARNING. THE CONTACT COASTED THE VEHICLE INTO A NEARBY PARKING LOT. THE CONTACT STATED HE NOTICED A FUEL LEAK UNDER THE VEHICLE. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT DRIVABLE. THE VEHICLE WAS TOWED TO THE LOCAL DEALER, MERCEDES-BENZ OF LYNNWOOD (17800 HWY 99, LYNNWOOD, WA 98037, (425) 375-0802) WHERE IT WAS DIAGNOSED WITH NEEDING A SPRING CLAMP TO BE REPLACED. THE VEHICLE WAS REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER HAD BEEN INFORMED OF FAILURE. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 10,590. *LN*JB

summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2017 MERCEDES-BENZ SPRINTER. THE CONTACT RECEIVED NOTIFICATION OF AN UNKNOWN NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER REGARDING THE AIR BAGS. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE MANUFACTURER EXCEEDED A REASONABLE AMOUNT OF TIME FOR THE RECALL REPAIR. GERZENZY'S RV WORLD (940 LAKELAND PARK CENTER DR, LAKELAND, FL 33809, (863) 694-0320) WAS CONTACTED AND CONFIRMED THAT THE PARTS WERE NOT AVAILABLE FOR THE RECALL REMEDY. THE MANUFACTURER WAS MADE AWARE OF THE ISSUE AND WAS NOT ABLE TO CONFIRM WHEN THE PARTS WERE TO BECOME AVAILABLE. THE CONTACT HAD NOT EXPERIENCED A FAILURE. THE VIN WAS NOT AVAILABLE.  *BF  CONSUMER STATED NO LONGER HAVE THE VEHICLE TRADED IT IN!  NO VIN PROVIDED. *JB

summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2017 MERCEDES-BENZ SPRINTER. WHILE DRIVING VARIOUS SPEEDS, THE SLIDER ENGAGED AND OPENED WITHOUT WARNING. THERE WERE NO WARNING INDICATORS ILLUMINATED. THE MANUFACTURER SENT AN INDEPENDENT MECHANIC TO DIAGNOSE AND REPAIR THE CONTROL MODULE AND THE SLIDE OUT SWITCH, BUT THE  FAILURE RECURRED. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED A SECOND TIME. THE MANUFACTURER INFORMED THE CONTACT THAT DUE TO THE HIGH HEAT CLIMATE SHE LIVED IN, THE FAILURE WOULD RECUR. THE DEALER WAS NOT CONTACTED. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 68,000.
